original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2386)@</color>  引氣凝盾，在武將週圍形成球形菱紋氣盾，在接下來的<color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1518)@</color>秒內減少90%<color=#80cc00>物理傷害</color>。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2386)@</color> Bleeding air condensed shield, forming a spherical diamond-shaped air shield around the generals, in the next <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1518)@</color> reduces <color=#80cc00>physical damage</color> by 90% in seconds.
